BattleCardAbility.Desc: [On Use] If Speed is equal to target's Vibration, all dice on this page gain +2 Power
Spend 100 Insanity to Use
[On Use] From the next Scene, target's dice are not affected by Power gain or loss
Spend 100 Insanity to Use
[On Use] Set all enemies' Virbration to 4;
This page can be reused only after 4 scenes
[On Use] Inflict 2 Burn to self
[On Clash Win] Inflict 1 Burn to each other
[On Clash] Inflict 1 Burn to each other
[On Hit] Gain 3 Negative Emotion Coins
[On Hit] Inflict 1 Burn
[On Hit] Inflict 2 Burn
[On Clash Win] Inflict 1 Burn to each other
[On Hit] Inflict 2 Feeble, Disarm, and Bind next Scene
[On Use] All dice on this page gain +2 Power if the target has more than 10 Burn
[On Use] Remove 5 Burn from self
[On Use] If the target has more than 10 Burn, set the cost of 2 random pages in hand to 0 (Reset after Use)
[On Hit] Inflict 3 Burn
[On Play] All dice gain +1 Power this scene
[On Play] Recover 10 Hp and 10 Stagger Resist
[On Play] Gain 2 smoke
[On Clash Win] Inflict 1 Bleed next Scene
[On Clash Win] Gain 1 Strength next Scene
Greta loses 1 Resilience whenever she loses a clash using this page
[On Clash Win] Inflict 2 Bleed next Scene
If the target has bleed, all dice on this page gain +2 Power
[On Hit] Inflict 3 Bind and Paralysis next Scene
[On Clash Win] Inflict 1 Bleed next Scene
At the start of each Scene if 'Fresh Meat' exists, upgrade itself
[On Use] Recover 3 Light
[On Hit] Inflict 1 Bleed and Fragile next Scene
[On Hit] Recover 8 HP; if target has Bleed, boost damage by +10
[On Clash Win] Inflict 2 Bleed next Scene
Targets all other characters; If target has Bleed, the first die gains +2 Power
[On Hit] Recover 4 HP; Recycled against a random enemy that didn't target this page
[On Clash Win] Inflict 2 Bleed next Scene
[On Use] Cancel target's action and turn them into Fresh Meat
Can only target Fresh Meat;
[On Use] Restore 3 Light
Can only target Fresh Meat
At the start of each Scene set cost of this card to current Light
[Combat Start] Give 2 Strength, Endurance, Haste, and Protection to a random ally; inflict 2 Feeble, Disarm, Bind, and Fragile to target
[Combat Start] Inflict 10 Fragile and 5 Paralysis to manually set target next Scene
All resistances become 'Fatal' next scene
[Combat Start] Inflict 2 Feeble this Scene
[On Clash Win] Inflict 1 Feeble to a random enemy next Scene
[On Hit] Inflict 2 Bind and Disarm next Scene
[Can Target Ally;][Combat Start] If target is an ally, give 2 Strength this Scene
[On Clash Win] Give 1 Strength to a random ally next Scene
[Combat Start] Give 1 Strength to all allies
[On Hit] Give 'Tagged' next Scene
[On Hit] Inflict 1 Paralysis next Scene
[When We Meet~] Recover 3 Light
[On Clash Win] Recover 5 HP
[Good Job~] If the last die on this page loses in a clash, the opponent gains 1 Haste and Endurance next Scene
[On Clash Win] Last die gains +1 Power
[On Hit] Seal a Speed die of the target next Scene
[Well Done~] If the first die on this page loses in a clash, the opponent gains 1 Strength next Scene
[On Clash Win] Destroy all dice on target's page
[Nice Work~] If all dice on this page lose in a clash, the opponent restores 2 Light
[ALL OF YOU;] [ONCE I BEGIN] Inflict one of the following statuses to targets at random: 2 Fragile, 2 Disarm, 2 Feeble, 2 Protection, 2 Strength, 2 Endurance
This page can be reused only after 4 scenes
[Take it On~] Stagger target ally; Target ally is Stupefied next Scene
The Page can only be played when no stupified ally exist.
This page is used against all enemies.(Except when used due to Brawl)
This page can be reused only after 4 scenes
If Speed is 5 or higher, all dice on this page gain +1 Power
If Speed is 5 or higher, all dice on this page gain +2 Power
[On Hit] Deal 4 Stagger damage
[On Use] Give Temporary Puppet Strings to all other allies next Scene
This page can be reused only after 4 scenes
[On Hit] Inflict 1 Bind next Scene
[Combat Start] Give Puppet Angelica 2 [Protection] and [Stagger Protection] this Scene
[Combat Start] Puppet Angelica deals +2 damage this scene
[Combat Start] Give Puppet Angelica 1 Strength and Endurance this Scene
[Combat Start] Puppet Angelica recovers 15 Stagger Resist
[On Clash Win] Destroy opponent's next die
This card can be only used when there is a dead ally
[On Play]Reive a random dead ally in the form of Puppet Angelica
[On Play] Puppet Angelica regains Puppet Strings
[On Play] Transfer Red Mark to the target
[Combat Start] Give target 2 Strength and Endurance
Can target allies
Recover all Health and Stagger Resist next Scene and start attacking allies;
Target will die if all of their other allies are dead;
Can only target enemy with 25% Max HP or less
Recover all Health and Stagger Resist next Scene and start attacking allies;
Target will die if all of their other allies are dead
Requires at least 25% of Max Hp to play;
[On Play] Lose 25% of Max Hp and heal target ally for half the lost HP
[Combat Start] Target gains all counter dice on this page.
Only point ally as target.
[On Play] Seal target into the 'Sealing Barrier' for the duration of the Scene.
[On Use]Boost dices' damage according to numbers of enemies targeted
The less targets the greater the boost
This page can be reused only after 4 scenes
[On Play] Put the Contract of Liberty for targeted ally
If the target is an enemy, put the contract on self
[On Play] Put the Contract of Amplification for targeted ally
If the target is an enemy, put the contract on self
[On Play] Put the Contract of Swiftness for targeted ally
If the target is an enemy, put the contract on self
[On Play] Put the Contract of Might for targeted ally
If the target is an enemy, put the contract on self
[On Play] Put the Contract of Light for targeted ally
If the target is an enemy, put the contract on self
